name: h3
description: The 2025 DeMarini CF Drop 8 Fastpitch Softball Bat is engineered for powerhouse hitters seeking an end-loaded swing feel. Certified for play across major leagues like USSSA, USA Softball (ASA), NSA, ISA, and WBSC, this bat combines cutting-edge technology with striking black and purple aesthetics. Its two-piece composite construction features a Paraflex Plus Composite for consistent responsiveness and an expansive sweet spot, ensuring every swing counts. Enhanced with a Tracer End Cap for improved bat speed and power, along with a Type V CF Connection for superior barrel performance and feel, this bat is a game-changer for serious athletes. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
features: Certification: USSSA, USA Softball (ASA), NSA, ISA & WBSC
Paraflex Plus Composite: Consistent responsiveness & massive sweet spot
Tracer End Cap: Enhances bat speed & power
